topic.title: How can I use cookie in my Zite?
topic.body: I tried use cookie in my zite but didn't work. I want to restore some temp setting like background music's volume, How can I realize it?

1_18hidquEH7k6Dnn5MDd4zJFJ2cTUF22wk2.body:
> [nofish](#comment_669_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's restricted by iframe sandboxing because every site using the same domain (127.0.0.1), but you can use zeroframe api get/setLocalStorage: http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#wrappergetlocalstorage

Thanks a lot

1_1NL5YZdozXc6ZNzKm78H4SjSMabyzV16YX.body: zeronet fast then the freenet, freenet always can't connect
